page.title: 13CHURCHES (CONTINUED).
page.content:
4 Roman Catholic Church. This comes under the parish of Aston Le Walls.The congregation is about 50,and the priest is Father Adams. There are no midweek activities. 5 St Mary's Church Warkworth. The parish church between the tiny villages of Warkworth and Overthorpe, was built in the 14th century.It can seat 125 people,but the average congregation is less than 20. 6 Thenford Church. This church dates back to the 12th century and serves the small village of Thenford.It shares a vicar,Mr Warnes,with Warkworth and another church.The congregation is about 10 people.
Church congregations seem to be declining,and consist mainly of older people.
